meanings.definition: In a way that involves two or more parties reciprocally.
meanings.sent1: They agreed to work mutually on the project.
meanings.sent2: The siblings always played mutually with their toys.
meanings.sent3: The cats stared at each other mutually, waiting for someone to make a move.
meanings.sent4: The sun and moon seemed to smile mutually at each other in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers and bees depend mutually on each other for survival.

meanings.definition: Shared by two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: It was a mutually beneficial agreement for both companies.
meanings.sent2: The park was a mutually enjoyed space for families and friends.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked so delicious that it was mutually decided to eat it all in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The secret was like a mutually held treasure between the two friends.
meanings.sent5: Their laughter created a mutually joyful atmosphere in the room.
